trans-unit.source: Proxy policies
trans-unit.target: Proxy policies

trans-unit.source: API Management proxy policies
trans-unit.target: API Management proxy policies

trans-unit.source: This section provides a reference for the following API Management policies.
trans-unit.target: This section provides a reference for the following API Management policies.

trans-unit.source: For information on adding and configuring policies, see <externalLink><linkText>Policies in API Management</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=398186</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For information on adding and configuring policies, see <externalLink><linkText>Policies in API Management</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=398186</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Policies are a powerful capability of the system that allow the publisher to change the behavior of the API through configuration.
trans-unit.target: Policies are a powerful capability of the system that allow the publisher to change the behavior of the API through configuration.

trans-unit.source: Policies are a collection of Statements that are executed sequentially on the request or response of an API.
trans-unit.target: Policies are a collection of Statements that are executed sequentially on the request or response of an API.

trans-unit.source: Popular Statements include format conversion from XML to JSON and call rate limiting to restrict the amount of incoming calls from a developer.
trans-unit.target: Popular Statements include format conversion from XML to JSON and call rate limiting to restrict the amount of incoming calls from a developer.

trans-unit.source: Many more policies are available out of the box.
trans-unit.target: Many more policies are available out of the box.

trans-unit.source: Policy expressions can be used as attribute values or text values in any of the API Management policies, unless the policy specifies otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Policy expressions can be used as attribute values or text values in any of the API Management policies, unless the policy specifies otherwise.

trans-unit.source: Some policies such as the <link xlink:href="8a13348b-7856-428f-8e35-9e4273d94323#choose" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Control flow</link> and <link xlink:href="8a13348b-7856-428f-8e35-9e4273d94323#set-variable" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set variable</link> policies are based on policy expressions.
trans-unit.target: Some policies such as the <link xlink:href="8a13348b-7856-428f-8e35-9e4273d94323#choose" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Control flow</link> and <link xlink:href="8a13348b-7856-428f-8e35-9e4273d94323#set-variable" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set variable</link> policies are based on policy expressions.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="8a13348b-7856-428f-8e35-9e4273d94323#AdvancedPolicies" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Advanced policies</link> and <legacyLink xlink:href="ea160028-fc04-4782-aa26-4b8329df3448" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Policy expressions</legacyLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="8a13348b-7856-428f-8e35-9e4273d94323#AdvancedPolicies" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Advanced policies</link> and <legacyLink xlink:href="ea160028-fc04-4782-aa26-4b8329df3448" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Policy expressions</legacyLink>.

trans-unit.source: Proxy policies
trans-unit.target: Proxy policies

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="034febe3-465f-4840-9fc6-c448ef520b0f#CheckHTTPHeader" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Check HTTP header</link> - Enforces existence and/or value of a HTTP Header.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="034febe3-465f-4840-9fc6-c448ef520b0f#CheckHTTPHeader" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Check HTTP header</link> - Enforces existence and/or value of a HTTP Header.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="034febe3-465f-4840-9fc6-c448ef520b0f#LimitCallRate" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Limit call rate</link> - Prevents API usage spikes by limiting calls and/or the bandwidth consumption rate.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="034febe3-465f-4840-9fc6-c448ef520b0f#LimitCallRate" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Limit call rate</link> - Prevents API usage spikes by limiting calls and/or the bandwidth consumption rate.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="034febe3-465f-4840-9fc6-c448ef520b0f#RestrictCallerIPs" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Restrict caller IPs</link> - Filters (allows/denies) calls from specific IP addresses and/or address ranges.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="034febe3-465f-4840-9fc6-c448ef520b0f#RestrictCallerIPs" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Restrict caller IPs</link> - Filters (allows/denies) calls from specific IP addresses and/or address ranges.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="034febe3-465f-4840-9fc6-c448ef520b0f#SetUsageQuota" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set usage quota</link> - Allows you to enforce a renewable or lifetime call volume and/or bandwidth quota.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="034febe3-465f-4840-9fc6-c448ef520b0f#SetUsageQuota" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set usage quota</link> - Allows you to enforce a renewable or lifetime call volume and/or bandwidth quota.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="034febe3-465f-4840-9fc6-c448ef520b0f#ValidateJWT" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Validate JWT</link> - Enforces existence and validity of a JWT extracted from either a specified HTTP Header or a specified query parameter.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="034febe3-465f-4840-9fc6-c448ef520b0f#ValidateJWT" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Validate JWT</link> - Enforces existence and validity of a JWT extracted from either a specified HTTP Header or a specified query parameter.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="8a13348b-7856-428f-8e35-9e4273d94323#choose" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Control flow</link> - Conditionally applies policy statements based on the evaluation of Boolean expressions.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="8a13348b-7856-428f-8e35-9e4273d94323#choose" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Control flow</link> - Conditionally applies policy statements based on the evaluation of Boolean expressions.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="8a13348b-7856-428f-8e35-9e4273d94323#set-variable" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set context variable</link> - Persist a value in a named context variable for later access.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="8a13348b-7856-428f-8e35-9e4273d94323#set-variable" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set context variable</link> - Persist a value in a named context variable for later access.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="061702a7-3a78-472b-a54a-f3b1e332490d#Basic" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticate with Basic</link> - Authenticate with a backend service using Basic authentication.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="061702a7-3a78-472b-a54a-f3b1e332490d#Basic" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticate with Basic</link> - Authenticate with a backend service using Basic authentication.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="061702a7-3a78-472b-a54a-f3b1e332490d#ClientCertificate" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticate with client certificate</link> - Authenticate with a backend service using client certificates.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="061702a7-3a78-472b-a54a-f3b1e332490d#ClientCertificate" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticate with client certificate</link> - Authenticate with a backend service using client certificates.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="8147199c-24d8-439f-b2a9-da28a70a890c#GetFromCache" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get from cache</link> - Perform cache look up and return a valid cached response when available.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="8147199c-24d8-439f-b2a9-da28a70a890c#GetFromCache" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get from cache</link> - Perform cache look up and return a valid cached response when available.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="8147199c-24d8-439f-b2a9-da28a70a890c#StoreToCache" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Store to cache</link> - Caches response according to the specified cache control configuration.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="8147199c-24d8-439f-b2a9-da28a70a890c#StoreToCache" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Store to cache</link> - Caches response according to the specified cache control configuration.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="7689d277-8abe-472a-a78c-e6d4bd43455d#AllowCrossDomainCalls" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Allow cross-domain calls</link> - Makes the API accessible from Adobe Flash and Microsoft Silverlight browser-based clients.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="7689d277-8abe-472a-a78c-e6d4bd43455d#AllowCrossDomainCalls" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Allow cross-domain calls</link> - Makes the API accessible from Adobe Flash and Microsoft Silverlight browser-based clients.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="7689d277-8abe-472a-a78c-e6d4bd43455d#CORS" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">CORS</link> - Adds cross-origin resource sharing (CORS) support to an operation or an API to allow cross-domain calls from browser-based clients.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="7689d277-8abe-472a-a78c-e6d4bd43455d#CORS" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">CORS</link> - Adds cross-origin resource sharing (CORS) support to an operation or an API to allow cross-domain calls from browser-based clients.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="7689d277-8abe-472a-a78c-e6d4bd43455d#JSONP" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">JSONP</link> - Adds JSON with padding (JSONP) support to an operation or an API to allow cross-domain calls from JavaScript browser-based clients.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="7689d277-8abe-472a-a78c-e6d4bd43455d#JSONP" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">JSONP</link> - Adds JSON with padding (JSONP) support to an operation or an API to allow cross-domain calls from JavaScript browser-based clients.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="7406a8ce-5f9c-4fae-9b0f-e574befb2ee9#ConvertJSONtoXML" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Convert JSON to XML</link> - Converts request or response body from JSON to XML.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="7406a8ce-5f9c-4fae-9b0f-e574befb2ee9#ConvertJSONtoXML" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Convert JSON to XML</link> - Converts request or response body from JSON to XML.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="7406a8ce-5f9c-4fae-9b0f-e574befb2ee9#ConvertXMLtoJSON" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Convert XML to JSON</link> - Converts request or response body from XML to JSON.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="7406a8ce-5f9c-4fae-9b0f-e574befb2ee9#ConvertXMLtoJSON" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Convert XML to JSON</link> - Converts request or response body from XML to JSON.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="7406a8ce-5f9c-4fae-9b0f-e574befb2ee9#Findandreplacestringinbody" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Find and replace string in body</link> - Finds a request or response substring and replaces it with a different substring.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="7406a8ce-5f9c-4fae-9b0f-e574befb2ee9#Findandreplacestringinbody" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Find and replace string in body</link> - Finds a request or response substring and replaces it with a different substring.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="7406a8ce-5f9c-4fae-9b0f-e574befb2ee9#MaskURLSContent" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Mask URLs in content</link> - Re-writes (masks) links in the response body and in the location header so that they point to the equivalent link via the proxy.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="7406a8ce-5f9c-4fae-9b0f-e574befb2ee9#MaskURLSContent" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Mask URLs in content</link> - Re-writes (masks) links in the response body and in the location header so that they point to the equivalent link via the proxy.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="7406a8ce-5f9c-4fae-9b0f-e574befb2ee9#SetBackendService" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set backend service</link> - Changes the backend service for an incoming request.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="7406a8ce-5f9c-4fae-9b0f-e574befb2ee9#SetBackendService" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set backend service</link> - Changes the backend service for an incoming request.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="7406a8ce-5f9c-4fae-9b0f-e574befb2ee9#SetBody" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set body</link> - Sets the message body for incoming and outgoing requests.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="7406a8ce-5f9c-4fae-9b0f-e574befb2ee9#SetBody" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set body</link> - Sets the message body for incoming and outgoing requests.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="7406a8ce-5f9c-4fae-9b0f-e574befb2ee9#SetHTTPheader" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set HTTP header</link> - Assigns a value to an existing response and/or request header or adds a new response and/or request header.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="7406a8ce-5f9c-4fae-9b0f-e574befb2ee9#SetHTTPheader" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set HTTP header</link> - Assigns a value to an existing response and/or request header or adds a new response and/or request header.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="7406a8ce-5f9c-4fae-9b0f-e574befb2ee9#SetQueryStringParameter" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set query string parameter</link> - Adds, replaces value of, or deletes request query string parameter.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="7406a8ce-5f9c-4fae-9b0f-e574befb2ee9#SetQueryStringParameter" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set query string parameter</link> - Adds, replaces value of, or deletes request query string parameter.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="7406a8ce-5f9c-4fae-9b0f-e574befb2ee9#RewriteURL" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Rewrite URL</link> - Converts a request URL from its public form to the form expected by the web service.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="7406a8ce-5f9c-4fae-9b0f-e574befb2ee9#RewriteURL" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Rewrite URL</link> - Converts a request URL from its public form to the form expected by the web service.
